title: Spiced Chocolate Banana Cake
ingredients: ['250g margarine or butter', '250g caster sugar', '3 eggs', '50g plain chocolate', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '2 teaspoons cocoa', '1/2 teaspoon ground cloves', '4 bananas', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '300g plain flour', '5 teaspoons baking powder']
